settings.title: Description
settings.answer:
Get ready to explore, to move forward, unbound, through the stillness of an unbroken life. Like the first glimmer of dawn stretching across an untouched horizon, it calls you to leave behind the familiar and step boldly into the vast unknown. A breath stirs the silent air, urging the heart to wander. It begins with the crackle of cardamom—sharp, alluring, like the first light touching a distant ridge. Then comes the breeze: iris and violet, soft and powdery, whispering of forgotten dreams. They bloom together, ethereal yet undeniable, guiding the soul onward.

The earth answers. Smoky sandalwood mingles with grounding cedarwood – raw and primal, like woodsmoke at twilight. Spices simmer, leather deepens, and musk hums beneath it all, intimate, bold, and dangerously comforting. This fragrance lingers like a promise, a pulse of adventure for those who dare to let go of boundaries, of time, and surrender to the irresistible allure of freedom.

settings.title: Shipping & Return
settings.answer: The usual shipping and delivery time is 7 days, but if you have any further inquiries You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.title: Additional Info
settings.answer:
T: Violet, Cardamom

H: Amber, Papyrus, Iris

B: Cedarwood, Leather, Sandalwood

settings.title: Free shipping
settings.content: Free worldwide shipping and returns - customs and duties taxes included

settings.title: Customer service
settings.content: We are available from monday to friday to answer your questions.

settings.title: Contact us
settings.content: Need to contact us ? Just send us an e-mail at info@yourstore.com

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.
